${modID}:Advance.NAME: Cash Advance
${modID}:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

${modID}:GoldenGamble.NAME: Golden Gamble
${modID}:GoldenGamble.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 Gold. NL If you win next turn, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
${modID}:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The next 2 times you roll *Dice you will always roll a one. NL Gain 1 *Buffer.
${modID}:SnakeEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next 2 times you roll *Dice you will always roll a one. NL Gain 1 *Buffer.

${modID}:RedKing.NAME: Red King
${modID}:RedKing.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Red_Dice now damage ALL enemies. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Red_Dice.

${modID}:DoubleDealing.NAME: Double-Dealing
${modID}:DoubleDealing.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards. NL Swap their cost this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FatesHand.NAME: Fate's Hand
${modID}:FatesHand.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2. NL If the discarded cards had the same cost, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:TrickstersMark.NAME: Trickster's Mark
${modID}:TrickstersMark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${modID}:LuckyBreak.NAME: Lucky Break
${modID}:LuckyBreak.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 Cards. NL If they have the same cost, gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:ChaosFour.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosFour.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosFive.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosFive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact and 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosSix.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosSix.DESCRIPTION: Your next card this turn is played twice. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ChaosSix.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! cards this turn are played twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosForm.NAME: Chaos Form
${modID}:ChaosForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, roll a *Chaos *Die.

${modID}:Fold.NAME: Fold
${modID}:Fold.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn. NL End your turn.

${modID}:LuckOfTheDraw.NAME: Luck of the Draw
${modID}:LuckOfTheDraw.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, you have a 25% chance to gain !M! Block.

${modID}:CardShark.NAME: Card Shark
${modID}:CardShark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this is the leftmost card in your hand, it costs 0.

${modID}:BlazingTactics.NAME: Blazing Tactics
${modID}:BlazingTactics.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card and set its cost to 1 this turn.

${modID}:Bluff.NAME: Bluff
${modID}:Bluff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have any debuffs, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:HeartOfTheCards.NAME: Heart Of The Cards
${modID}:HeartOfTheCards.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:HeartOfTheCards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw X+1 cards and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HitAndRun.NAME: Hit and Run
${modID}:HitAndRun.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Your Attacks deal 75% more damage. Whenever you play an Attack, Exhaust it.
${modID}:HitAndRun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal 75% more damage. Whenever you play an Attack, Exhaust it.

${modID}:CoinBarrage.NAME: Coin Barrage
${modID}:CoinBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 11 times. NL Reduce your max hand size by !M!.

${modID}:LongGame.NAME: Long Game
${modID}:LongGame.DESCRIPTION: Doesn't shuffle into your deck at the start of combat. Added into hand on turn !M!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HighRoller.NAME: High Roller
${modID}:HighRoller.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Six, draw a card.

${modID}:JokerTrick.NAME: Joker Trick
${modID}:JokerTrick.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card type. NL Put a random card of that type from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs !M! less this turn. NL Exhaust
${modID}:JokerTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card type. NL Put a random card of that type from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust

${modID}:AttackFromDeck.NAME: Attack
${modID}:AttackFromDeck.DESCRIPTION: Put a random Attack from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:SkillFromDeck.NAME: Skill
${modID}:SkillFromDeck.DESCRIPTION: Put a random Skill from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:PowerFromDeck.NAME: Power
${modID}:PowerFromDeck.DESCRIPTION: Put a random Power from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:CheatersLuck.NAME: Cheater's Luck
${modID}:CheatersLuck.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a random card in your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CheatersLuck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a random cards in your hand twice. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenOne.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenOne.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenTwo.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenTwo.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenThree.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenThree.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenFour.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenFour.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenFive.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenFive.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenSix.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenSix.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PrismaticRoll.NAME: Prismatic Roll
${modID}:PrismaticRoll.DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Red_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Blue_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Green_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Purple_Die. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PrismaticRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Red_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Blue_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Green_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Purple_Die.

${modID}:PocketPair.NAME: Pocket Pair
${modID}:PocketPair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Green_Dice. NL Give them Retain. NL Exhaust

${modID}:Underdog.NAME: Underdog
${modID}:Underdog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL  If your HP is lower than the enemy's, this deals double damage.

${modID}:InvigoratingRiffle.NAME: Invigorating Riffle
${modID}:InvigoratingRiffle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Skill is Exhausted, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:AceInTheHole.NAME: Ace In The Hole
${modID}:AceInTheHole.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Purge.
${modID}:AceInTheHole.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Put a card from your draw or exhaust pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Purge.

${modID}:WaveOfGreed.NAME: Wave of Greed
${modID}:WaveOfGreed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! gold for each enemy hit. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DrunkenStrike.NAME: Drunken Strike
${modID}:DrunkenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Whenever you draw this, randomize its cost.

${modID}:LuckySeven.NAME: Lucky Seven
${modID}:LuckySeven.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the 7th card you've played this turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:LuckyEight.NAME: Lucky Eight
${modID}:LuckyEight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this is the 8th card you've played this turn, gain 8 Thorns.

${modID}:LuckyNine.NAME: Lucky Nine
${modID}:LuckyNine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. If this is the 9th card you've played this turn, gain 9 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BrokenBottle.NAME: Broken Bottle
${modID}:BrokenBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add a *Glass *Shard into your hand.

${modID}:UnleashedStrategy.NAME: Unleashed Strategy
${modID}:UnleashedStrategy.DESCRIPTION: Increase your max hand size by !M!. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E]  for every 3 cards in hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GlassShard.NAME: Glass Shard
${modID}:GlassShard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Grapes.NAME: Grapes
${modID}:Grapes.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Increase a card's Block and damage by !M! this combat. Add a copy of this card into your hand that costs 1 more. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Melon.NAME: Melon
${modID}:Melon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, draw a card.

${modID}:CoinFlick.NAME: Coin Flick
${modID}:CoinFlick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a 2+ cost card, add this from the draw pile to your hand and increase its damage by !M!.

${modID}:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
${modID}:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Purple_Die. NL Retain your hand this turn.
${modID}:Anticipate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Purple_Dice. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${modID}:CardCascade.NAME: Card Cascade
${modID}:CardCascade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:GoForBroke.NAME: Go For Broke
${modID}:GoForBroke.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, apply !M! ${modID}:Crippling_Debt to a random enemy and increase this by 1. Resets each turn.

${modID}:Reevaluate.NAME: Reevaluate
${modID}:Reevaluate.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. Gain Block equal to its damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Reevaluate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. Gain Block equal to its damage.

${modID}:DangerousInvestment.NAME: Dangerous Investment
${modID}:DangerousInvestment.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Strength. While they are alive, gain [E]  at the start of your turn.
${modID}:DangerousInvestment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Strength. While they are alive, gain [E] [E]  at the start of your turn.

${modID}:CollectorsBlade.NAME: Collector's Blade
${modID}:CollectorsBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has ${modID}:Crippling_Debt, they lose !M! Strength.

${modID}:Reroll.NAME: Re-Roll
${modID}:Reroll.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, whenever you play all six dice values, take an extra turn after this one.
${modID}:Reroll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Once per turn, whenever you play all six dice values, take an extra turn after this one.

${modID}:BackBurner.NAME: Back Burner
${modID}:BackBurner.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. Increase block gained by !M! this combat.

${modID}:ControlledChaos.NAME: Controlled Chaos
${modID}:ControlledChaos.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Reduce your max hand size by 2.

${modID}:SwiftGuard.NAME: Swift Guard
${modID}:SwiftGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce your max hand size by !M!.

${modID}:Discipline.NAME: Discipline
${modID}:Discipline.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Set your max hand size to 4.

${modID}:Floodgate.NAME: Floodgate
${modID}:Floodgate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your hand becomes full, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:RestoringForce.NAME: Restoring Force
${modID}:RestoringForce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL ${modID}:Overflow: Increase your max hand size by !M!.

${modID}:ShiftyStrike.NAME: Shifty Strike
${modID}:ShiftyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL ${modID}:Overflow: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:SlotMachineLearning.NAME: Slot Machine Learning
${modID}:SlotMachineLearning.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. If you don't, gain !M! Strength.
${modID}:SlotMachineLearning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. If you don't, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:HoldOut.NAME: Hold Out
${modID}:HoldOut.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Gain [E] [E] [E] [E] .

${modID}:Dive.NAME: Dive
${modID}:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.

${modID}:LayLow.NAME: Lay Low
${modID}:LayLow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Grow.NAME: Grow
${modID}:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile that costs 1 more.
${modID}:Grow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Temporary Strength. NL Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile that costs 1 more.

${modID}:PincerAttack.NAME: Pincer Attack
${modID}:PincerAttack.DESCRIPTION: Discard your left- and rightmost cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each [E]  or [${modID}:returnIcon]  in the cost of the discarded cards.

${modID}:ChippedBlade.NAME: Chipped Blade
${modID}:ChippedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 less damage for each card in your discard pile.

${modID}:Unflex.NAME: Unflex
${modID}:Unflex.DESCRIPTION: EVERYONE loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${modID}:Recession.NAME: Recession
${modID}:Recession.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain !${modID}:playerWeak! Weak.
